ygData.subject: Re: Hello everyone.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Mike: Welcome Aboard :)  What server are you playing on ???  I know on Maelin right now they are recruiting in guilds for new players and alot of them do
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Mike Moya" <laffys@y...> wrote:
>
Mike:
Welcome Aboard :) What server are you playing on ??? I know on Maelin
right now they are recruiting in guilds for new players and alot of
them do not have a level restriction. That is a great way to meet up
with friends online and get to know people. My alt is now in a guild
that does Idons 2 nights a week and have been able to make some good
group friends that way. Hope this helps :)

Tartracheon
68th Power Wizzy
Maelin Starpyre

> Well wanted to say hello to all. Just joined today! Also started
> playing Everquest like a few days ago. So I hope that this group would
> enhance my game playing. One more thing, I wanted to know how I can
> look for local Everquest groups. I live in Brooksville, FL. So if
> anyone has any ideas, please let me know. Thanks.
>
